oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vespers at Lakeshore Methodist Camp
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color photograph of several people gathered for vespers at Lakeshore Methodist Camp. They are seated on the ground and on stone benches. An American flag is visible next to a man who is standing with a podium, on left. Features a white border, divided back, and narrative on reverse. [No. 2DK-1660]
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: People; Prayer; Flags; Trees
